content: this article is pure bullshit.the supreme court ruled voter id is legal.the liberal democrats under obama tried every trick in the legal book to get id changed. well it failed and new president and justice department is in power.voter id yes.gee illegal aliens dont have them.guess what they can not vote any way. now for the blacks.you need 2 ids to get ss card-ss benefits -welfarew -food stamps-open bank account for your federal welfare or ss checks.ditect deposite only now.under obamas laws have to have 2 ids for doctor or hospital .this is to prove it is you for federal and state payments to them. have to have ids for power -water-cable tv-rent by hud or denior citisens and cell phones.now you see the no id is not a hardship. they are mandintoryto bet anything in usa .so you democratic liberal fools get a life it is not descrimination.
